SELECT A.TEST_NUM ,A.PASS_AMT ,A.NON_PASS_AMT ,B.PRCS_ING_CODE ,B.PRCS_CODE ,B.PRCS_AMT ,A.TEST_SEMI_YN ,FIND_PROD_NAME(B.PROD_CODE) AS PROD_NAME FROM PROD_QUALITY A
LEFT JOIN PRCS_ING B ON (A.PRCS_ING_CODE = B.PRCS_ING_CODE) WHERE B.PRCS_CODE = (SELECT MAX(PRCS_CODE) FROM PRCS_ING) AND A.TEST_SEMI_YN = 'C' AND b.prcs_dir_ing_sts = 'S3'
ORDER BY B.PRCS_ING_CODE

SELECT A.TEST_NUM ,B.PRCS_ING_CODE ,B.PRCS_CODE ,B.PRCS_AMT ,A.PASS_AMT ,A.NON_PASS_AMT ,A.TEST_DATE ,FIND_PROD_NAME(B.PROD_CODE) AS PROD_NAME FROM PROD_QUALITY A
LEFT JOIN PRCS_ING B ON (A.PRCS_ING_CODE = B.PRCS_ING_CODE) WHERE B.PRCS_CODE = (SELECT MAX(PRCS_CODE) FROM PRCS_ING) AND A.TEST_SEMI_YN = 'C' AND test_date IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY TEST_DATE DESC

SELECT A.TEST_NUM ,A.PRCS_ING_CODE ,A.TEST_NUM ,B.TEST_NUM_INFO ,B.TEST_CODE ,B.PASS_VALUE ,B.TEST_RESULT ,B.PASS_YN ,B.EMP_CODE ,FIND_CDNM('0O', PASS_YN) AS PASS_YN2 ,FIND_EMP_NAME(EMP_CODE) AS EMP_NAME ,FIND_CDNM('TEST-TYPE', TEST_CODE) AS TEST_NAME FROM prod_quality A JOIN prod_quality_info B ON(a.test_num = b.test_num) WHERE a.test_num =#{testNum}

SELECT A.TEST_NUM ,B.PRCS_ING_CODE ,B.PRCS_CODE ,B.PRCS_AMT ,A.PASS_AMT ,A.NON_PASS_AMT ,A.TEST_DATE FROM PROD_QUALITY A
LEFT JOIN PRCS_ING B ON (A.PRCS_ING_CODE = B.PRCS_ING_CODE) WHERE B.PRCS_CODE = (SELECT MAX(PRCS_CODE) FROM PRCS_ING) AND A.TEST_SEMI_YN = 'C' AND test_date IS NOT NULL AND LOWER(A.TEST_NUM) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{testNum}) || '%' ORDER BY TEST_DATE DESC
